attributes.action: No parking spaces front of building because of people out of neighbourhood
attributes.background: I struggle every single day to find parking space front of my home because of people who park here , going shop or other places in my surrounding. Sounds similar? People wants to save little money and make us very stressful if we can't find parking spaces.we need parkometers exemption for residents

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Parking on local roads is the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
